Section.name: About Acharya Institute of Technology
Section.description:
Acharya Institute of Technology is a private co-educational engineering and management college in Bengaluru, India. The institute is approved by AICTE and affiliated to Visvesaraya Technological University (VTU), Belgaum. Acharya Institute of Technology is accredited by NAAC with B++ grade. It has been accredited both by AICTE and NBA (National Board of Accreditation). The college also received the status of a Technical Institute by AICTE.
Admission to Acharya Institute of Technology B.Tech courses is granted on the basis of KCET Cutoff. For Outside state candidates COMEDK-UGET Score is considered. For MTech Admissions, the college accepts GATE / PGCET Score. The institute currently has a total strength of 12,000+ students across all departments, as well as over 300 extremely qualified faculty members.
Candidate must have completed Graduation in relevant Discipline from VTU or any recognised university with a minimum aggregate of 50% marks+ PGCET Score

Ques. What type of college is the Acharya Institute of Technology?
Ans. Acharya Institute of Technology is a private co-educational engineering and management college in Bengaluru, India. Established in 2000, it offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various disciplines.
Ques. What are the accreditations and affiliations of the Acharya Institute of Technology?
Ans. Acharya Institute of Technology is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) and accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). It also holds a B++ grade from the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC)
Ques. What is the admission criteria at Acharya Institute of Technology?
Ans. For B.Tech courses, Acharya Institute of Technology admission is based on the KCET score. Outside Karnataka, students can apply through COMEDK-UGET. For MTech admissions, GATE or PGCET scores are considered.
Ques. What are the courses offered at Acharya Institute of Technology?
Ans. Acharya Institute of Technology offers BE, M.Tech, MBA and MCA programs. Acharya Institute of Technology Bangalore provides B.Tech programs in various engineering disciplines, including Computer Engineering, Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering, Information Technology, and Mechanical Engineering. It also offers an M.Tech in Mechanical Design and an MBA.
Ques. What are the campus facilities at Acharya Institute of Technology?
Ans. Acharya Institute of Technologyâ€™s campus spans 120 acres and has excellent facilities for students. The campus has spacious classrooms equipped with smartboards and projection facilities. It has a library, laboratories, hostels for boys and girls, a health centre, a gym, and wifi- access.
Ques. What is the application process at Acharya Institute of Technology?
Ans. Interested candidates can apply online through the Acharya Institute of Technology's official website. Eligibility candidates have to fill out the online application form, submit required documents, pay the application fee, appear for entrance exams, and attend counselling or interviews. The seat allotment is based on merit. Once seats are allotted, candidates will be called for document verification and the final step is confirmation of admission.
Ques. What are the entrance tests at Acharya Institute of Technology?
Ans. Acharya Institute of Technology admits students based on the All India Ranking obtained in the JEE Main exam conducted by the NTA for B.Tech courses. KCET, GATE, MAT, and PGCET are the entrance tests considered for various programs.

Ans. Acharya Institute of Technology has a diverse faculty strength comprising 306 highly qualified members, many of these teachers hold Ph.D. degrees in their respective disciplines.
